author: blueelvis
body:
<!--

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------
1. Run the below script -
```
echo "Hello"

Write-Output -InputObject "SharePoint Service Application Status -"
Get-SPServiceApplication | Select-Object -Property DisplayName,Status

#Write-Output -InputObject "SharePoint Logfile Check -"
$logFilter = "WIN-RRAS-" + (Get-Date -Format yyyyMMdd) + "*.log"
Get-ChildItem -Path "C:\Program Files\Common Files\microsoft shared\Web Server Extensions\16\LOGS" -Filter $logFilter

```

Expected behavior
-----------------
```
Hello
SharePoint Service Application Status -

DisplayName                                                 Status
-----------                                                 ------
Access Services 2010                                        Online
Secure Store Service                                        Online
PowerPoint Conversion Service Application                   Online
State Service                                               Online
Workflow Service Application                                Online
Project Server Service Application                          Online
PerformancePoint Service Application                        Online
Visio Graphics Service                                      Online
Managed Metadata Service                                    Online
App Management Service                                      Online
Security Token Service Application                          Online
Machine Translation Service                                 Online
Application Discovery and Load Balancer Service Application Online
Usage and Health data collection                            Online
Search Administration Web Service for Hello Search!         Online
Word Automation Services                                    Online
User Profile Service                                        Online
Business Data Connectivity Service                          Online
Access Services                                             Online
Hello Search!                                               Online


    Directory: C:\Program Files\Common Files\microsoft shared\Web Server Extensions\16\LOGS


Mode                LastWriteTime         Length Name                                                                                                                                
----                -------------         ------ ----                                                                                                                                
-a----       23-05-2017     14:35       51240899 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1405.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     15:08       28280761 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1435.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     15:38       19489592 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1508.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     16:08       19449016 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1538.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     16:38       18678218 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1608.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     17:08       19085084 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1638.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     17:38       18235719 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1708.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     18:08       19218235 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1738.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     21:50       29561970 WIN-RRAS-20170523-1808.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     22:20       25102710 WIN-RRAS-20170523-2150.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     22:50       18813086 WIN-RRAS-20170523-2220.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     23:20       19691535 WIN-RRAS-20170523-2250.log                                                                                                          
-a----       23-05-2017     23:45       16313317 WIN-RRAS-20170523-2320.log

```
Actual behavior
---------------
```
Hello
SharePoint Service Application Status -

DisplayName                                                 Status
-----------                                                 ------
Access Services 2010                                        Online
Secure Store Service                                        Online
PowerPoint Conversion Service Application                   Online
State Service                                               Online
Workflow Service Application                                Online
Project Server Service Application                          Online
PerformancePoint Service Application                        Online
Visio Graphics Service                                      Online
Managed Metadata Service                                    Online
App Management Service                                      Online
Security Token Service Application                          Online
Machine Translation Service                                 Online
Application Discovery and Load Balancer Service Application Online
Usage and Health data collection                            Online
Search Administration Web Service for Hello Search!         Online
Word Automation Services                                    Online
User Profile Service                                        Online
Business Data Connectivity Service                          Online
Access Services                                             Online
Hello Search!                                               Online
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                  



```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```
Name                           Value                                                                                                              
----                           -----                                                                                                              
PSVersion                      5.1.14393.0                                                                                                        
PSEdition                      Desktop                                                                                                            
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                                            
BuildVersion                   10.0.14393.0                                                                                                       
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000                                                                                                    
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                                                                                                
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                                
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                                                                                            

```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: The cmdlet is not in the Repo so I close the Issue. You should report the Issue to Sharepoint team.

comments.author: blueelvis
comments.body: @ISazonov - But, are you sure that this problem is not related to Powershell? Any idea how could I report this to the SharePoint team?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@blueelvis Can you repo this without SharePoint cmdlet?
You can report to https://sharepoint.uservoice.com/

title: Get-SPServiceApplication Commandlet not displaying output properly when
